TopicTitle: KSP crashes after opening VAB for the third time in the same game.

Articles.Content:
So, whenever I open up the VAB for about the third time, the game crashes on me. I have no idea why this is happening. It also only appears to happen in career mode, for it doesn't happen when I tested it in sandbox. I'd also like to know wheree I can post my crash report.

 

Kind regards

Had the same problem a time ago on Linux, what I did was delete all mods, open KSP in 64 bit, first open other buildings like the tracking station, science lab etc hopefully the VAB will be ready to be clicked on (I clicked them from the map, not the icons).

After that I tried the same with 32 bit, solved it for me.
And did you reinstall the mods afterwards?

3 hours ago, Colonel of Ferocity said:

And did you reinstall the mods afterwards? 

 

Yep, although I still frequent crashes it's better than nothing.

 

(My mods are: Kerbalism, Kerbal engineer, kerbal alarm clock, final frontiers and chatterer).
Now that I run it in 64 bit, it seems to be okay
